question: Which among the following is the most important character of the ‘Goldilocks Zone ‘ of the space?
option1: It is a small region which is extremely hot and presence of most elements in vapor state
option2: It is small region of the space which is extremely cold
option3: It is a region of space which is neither too hot nor too cold and has conditions which are a must for life
option4: It is a region of space which is characterized by a lot of asteroids
answer: It is a region of space which is neither too hot nor too cold and has conditions which are a must for life
explanation: Goldilock region is the space which is neither too hot nor too cold and has conditions which are a must for life. So the Goldilock zone is a habitable zone.
